name: Abi Planner Agent
description: Plans and decomposes complex user queries into structured execution workflows. Uses semantic reasoning to create optimal agent sequences and task dependencies for efficient workflow orchestration.

skills.name: Query Decomposition
skills.description: Break down complex user queries into manageable, sequential tasks.
examples: Split 'analyze market trends and create report' into data collection + analysis + reporting

skills.name: Task Sequencing
skills.description: Organize tasks in optimal execution order considering dependencies.
examples: Ensure data collection happens before analysis

skills.name: Agent Mapping
skills.description: Match each task to the most appropriate agent type based on capabilities.
examples: Map data extraction task to Actor agent, analysis to specialized agent

skills.name: Plan Validation
skills.description: Verify that the execution plan is feasible and complete.
examples: Check that all user requirements are covered in the plan
